Class RevocationObject

java.lang.Object
vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.storagelayer.StorageElement
vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.applicationlayer.revocation.RevocationObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RevocationObject
extends StorageElement
Class representing a StorageElement which encapsulates a revealed RevocationSecret.

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Method to check if the revealed secret actually corresponds with the RevocationCommitment which was used as StorageElementIdentifier for this StorageElement.
      Returns:
      True if the revealed secret actually corresponds with the RevocationCommitment used for the constructor of this instance; false otherwise.
